verses.verse: God<WH430> said<WH559> to Jacob,<WH3290> "Arise,<WH6965> go up<WH5927> to Bethel,<WH1008> and live<WH3427> there.<WH6213> Make there an altar<WH4196> to God,<WH410> who appeared<WH7200> to you when you fled<WH1272> from the face<WH6440> of Esau<WH6215> your brother.<WH251>"

Then Jacob<WH3290> said<WH559> to his household,<WH1004> and to all who were with him,<WH5493> "Put away the foreign<WH5236> gods<WH430> that are among you,<WH8432> purify<WH2891> yourselves,<WH2498> change your garments.<WH8071>

Let us arise,<WH6965> and go up<WH5927> to Bethel.<WH1008> I will make<WH6213> there an altar<WH4196> to God,<WH410> who answered<WH6030> me in the day<WH3117> of my distress,<WH6869> and was with me in the way<WH1870> which I went.<WH1980>"

They gave<WH5414> to Jacob<WH3290> all the foreign<WH5236> gods<WH430> which were in their hands,<WH3027> and the rings<WH5141> which were in their ears;<WH241> and Jacob<WH3290> hid<WH2934> them under the oak<WH424> which was by Shechem.<WH7927>
They traveled,<WH5265> and a terror<WH2847> of God<WH430> was on the cities<WH5892> that were around them,<WH5439> and they didn't<WH7291> pursue the<WH310> sons<WH1121> of Jacob.<WH3290>
So Jacob<WH3290> came<WH935> to Luz<WH3870> (that is,<WH1008> Bethel), which is in the land<WH776> of Canaan,<WH3667> he and all the people who were with him.<WH5971>

He built<WH1129> an altar<WH4196> there,<WH7121> and called the place<WH4725> El Beth El;<WH416> because there God<WH430> was revealed<WH1540> to him,<WH1272> when he fled from the face<WH6440> of his brother.<WH251>
Deborah,<WH1683> Rebekah<WH7259>'s nurse,<WH3243> died,<WH4191> and she was buried<WH6912> below Bethel<WH1008> under the oak;<WH437> and its name<WH8034> was called<WH7121> Allon Bacuth.<WH439>
God<WH430> appeared<WH7200> to Jacob<WH3290> again,<WH935> when he came from Paddan Aram,<WH6307> and blessed him.<WH1288>

God<WH430> said<WH559> to him,<WH8034> "Your name is Jacob.<WH3290> Your name<WH8034> shall not be Jacob<WH3290> any more,<WH8034> but your name will<WH7121> be Israel.<WH3478>" He named<WH8034> him<WH7121> Israel.<WH3478>

God<WH430> said<WH559> to him,<WH410> "I am God Almighty.<WH7706> Be fruitful<WH6509> and multiply.<WH7235> A nation<WH1471> and a company<WH6951> of nations<WH1471> will be from you,<WH4428> and kings will come<WH3318> out of your body.<WH2504>
The land<WH776> which I gave<WH5414> to Abraham<WH85> and Isaac,<WH3327> I will give it<WH5414> to you,<WH2233> and to your seed after you<WH310> will I give<WH5414> the land.<WH776>"
God<WH430> went up<WH5927> from him in the place<WH4725> where he spoke with him.<WH1696>

Jacob<WH3290> set up<WH5324> a pillar<WH4676> in the place<WH4725> where he spoke<WH1696> with him,<WH4678> a pillar of stone.<WH68> He poured<WH5258> out a drink offering<WH5262> on it,<WH3332> and poured oil on it.<WH8081>
Jacob<WH3290> called<WH7121> the name<WH8034> of the place<WH4725> where God<WH430> spoke<WH1696> with him<WH1008> "Bethel."

They traveled<WH5265> from Bethel.<WH1008> There was still<WH5750> some<WH3530> distance<WH776> to come<WH935> to Ephrath,<WH672> and Rachel<WH7354> travailed.<WH3205> She had hard<WH7185> labor.<WH3205>
When she was in hard<WH7185> labor,<WH3205> the midwife<WH3205> said<WH559> to her,<WH3372> "Don't be afraid, for now you will have another son.<WH1121>"
It happened,<WH5315> as her soul was departing<WH3318> (for she died<WH4191>), that she named<WH8034> him<WH7121> Benoni,<WH1126> but his father<WH1> named<WH8034> him Benjamin.<WH1144>
Rachel<WH7354> died,<WH4191> and was buried<WH6912> in the way<WH1870> to Ephrath<WH672> (the same is Bethlehem<WH1035>).
Jacob<WH3290> set<WH5324> up a pillar<WH4676> on her grave.<WH6900> The same is the Pillar<WH4678> of Rachel<WH7354>'s grave<WH6900> to this day.<WH3117>
Israel<WH3478> traveled,<WH5265> and spread<WH5186> his tent<WH168> beyond<WH1973> the tower<WH4026> of Eder.<WH4029>

It happened,<WH3478> while Israel lived<WH7931> in that land,<WH776> that Reuben<WH7205> went<WH3212> and lay<WH7901> with Bilhah,<WH1090> his father<WH1>'s concubine,<WH6370> and Israel<WH3478> heard<WH8085> of it.<WH1121> Now the sons of Jacob<WH3290> were twelve.<WH8147>
The sons<WH1121> of Leah:<WH3812> Reuben<WH7205> (Jacob<WH3290>'s firstborn<WH1060>), Simeon,<WH8095> Levi,<WH3878> Judah,<WH3063> Issachar,<WH3485> and Zebulun.<WH2074>
The sons<WH1121> of Rachel:<WH7354> Joseph<WH3130> and Benjamin.<WH1144>
The sons<WH1121> of Bilhah<WH1090> (Rachel<WH7354>'s handmaid<WH8198>): Dan<WH1835> and Naphtali.<WH5321>
The sons<WH1121> of Zilpah<WH2153> (Leah<WH3812>'s handmaid<WH8198>): Gad<WH1410> and Asher.<WH836> These are the sons<WH1121> of Jacob,<WH3290> who were born<WH3205> to him in Paddan Aram.<WH6307>
Jacob<WH3290> came<WH935> to Isaac<WH3327> his father,<WH1> to Mamre,<WH4471> to Kiriath Arba<WH7153> (which is Hebron<WH2275>), where Abraham<WH85> and Isaac<WH3327> lived as foreigners.<WH1481>
The days<WH3117> of Isaac<WH3327> were one hundred<WH3967> eighty<WH8084> years.<WH8141>

Isaac<WH3327> gave up the spirit,<WH1478> and died,<WH4191> and was gathered<WH622> to his people,<WH5971> old<WH2205> and full<WH7649> of days.<WH3117> Esau<WH6215> and Jacob,<WH3290> his sons,<WH1121> buried him.<WH6912>
